"CountryShow"
{
        "messages"
        {
                "playerjoin"            "{PLAYERTYPE} {GREEN}{PLAYERNAME} {DEFAULT}> connected from country {GREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRY} {DEFAULT}({LIGHTGREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRYSHORT}{DEFAULT})"
                "playerdisc"            "{PLAYERTYPE} {GREEN}{PLAYERNAME} {DEFAULT}> from country {GREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRY} {DEFAULT}({LIGHTGREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRYSHORT}{DEFAULT}) disconnected {GREEN}reason: {DEFAULT}{DISC_REASON}"
        }
        "messages_admin"
        {
                "playerjoin"            "{PLAYERTYPE} {RED}{PLAYERNAME} {DEFAULT}> connected from country {GREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRY} {DEFAULT}({LIGHTGREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRYSHORT}{DEFAULT})"
                "playerdisc"            "{PLAYERTYPE} {RED}{PLAYERNAME} {DEFAULT}> from country {GREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRY} {DEFAULT}({LIGHTGREEN}{PLAYERCOUNTRYSHORT}{DEFAULT}) disconnected {GREEN}reason: {DEFAULT}{DISC_REASON}"
        }
}
